Package net.nova_project.backend.logging

Class NovaLogConfigurer

java.lang.Object
net.nova_project.backend.logging.NovaLogConfigurer
public final class NovaLogConfigurer
extends java.lang.Object
This is a tool to setup the log system for the nova backend.
